document.full_text: a yemeni man accused of trying to break into the cockpit of an american airlines flight from chicago to san francisco over the weekend was charged on monday with interfering with a flight crew.
document.title: yemeni man charged in weekend airline incident
lines_and_colors: a yemeni man accused of trying to break into the cockpit of an american airlines flight from chicago to san francisco over the weekend was charged on monday with interfering with a flight crew.
